name: Miss Furry
description:
General


Miss Furry is an Pleasurable Arcade Game, consisting of a Series of Thrilling Mini-Games with the Stunning Furry Girls 🐺

Stunning Furry Girls, Great Atmosphere, Amazing Music, 56 Levels with Full HD Furry Artworks.
Good for relaxing after a hard day at work. Join us!

Unique Features


  • Seven Game Modes
  • Dynamic Gameplay and Varying Degrees of Difficulty
  • 56 Fantastic Levels with Full HD & 4K Furry Artworks
  • Great Atmosphere & Amazing Music
  • 100 Achievements
  • Cheat Code to Complete the Level - "MISS"

Contact - darkfantasy.gamedev@gmail.com

Game Modes


  • Furry Tron
  • Furball
  • Furrman
  • Furry Cutter
  • Catch the Furry!
  • Puzzle
  • Rock, Paper, Scissors
